name: Aethium VR
description:
"Aethium" is a virtual reality (VR) experience, where the player is situated within a glass box in a vast, beautiful environment. Within this box, the player can perform various tasks and interact with multiple physics objects.

 Aethium will be available to play on the Oculus Quest 2 VR device.

Aethium is developed alongside alongside Liminal VR
